```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r setup}
library(lineaGT)
```

The dataset can be filtered calling the `filter_dataset()` function.

```{r setup}
data_filt = data %>% dplyr::select(starts_with("cov")) %>% 
  filter_dataset(IS=data$IS)
```
